document.topic_text:
World Penguin Day Hi, readers! Do you know what today is? It’s World Penguin Day! To celebrate, here are some cool penguin jokes to tell your friends and family. Q. What do penguins eat for lunch? A. Ice-burgers! Q. Where do penguins keep their money? A. In the snow bank!
Q. Why do penguins carry fish in their beaks? A. Because they don’t have any pockets!
What’s your favourite penguin joke? Let us know in the comments! Talk to you later,
document.post:
